timeline.body:
I feel like we are creating so many throw away tenants in these tests. I'd suggest that we move all tenant-aware tests to a new class. We can just create one test tenant in a `@BeforeClass` and reuse it as much as possible. Will make the overall logic a lot clear that way too.

But feel free to do that in a separate PR.
